description: Update an existing quality control classification.
permissions: Allowed for admins or users who are manager members of the broker organization.
side_effects: Updates the specified quality control classification fields.
validation_notes: Classification ID argument is required. At least one of --name or --description must be provided. Broker cannot be changed after creation. Name must be present and unique per broker when provided.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be present and unique per broker when provided
